pageContext.description: Width as: "27 mm (blade), 65 mm (hilt)"  Weight as: "10 3/4 oz = .336 gr"  My calculation: 10 3/4 = 10.75 oz = 304.75 gr
pageContext.other: The writer of these last few cards puts periods, equal signs, squiggles and quote marks throughout commentary, so even though it clearly states .336 gr, it may actually be 336 which still isn't that close., Lower left corner: “Seen”
pageContext.publications: Reliquary XVI, 243. Fig =, Wilts Arch. Mag. Vol. XXXVII. Fig 129, no=96, Wilts Arch. Mag. XXXVIII, 343, Devizes Museum Catalogue Pt II, 26. B 1, Devizes Museum Catalogue Pt II, 2nd edition, Pl 17.2, DM 1105  GC 632 B.A.V. Trump P.P.S. 1962 No. 5. p. 99 (264)
pageContext.site: England, N. Wiltshire, Wiloford by Salisbury
